summary: A Turkish commando must infiltrate and capture a group of terrorists living in the mountains.
cast: Serdar Kebapçilar|Filiz Taçbas|Tugrul Meteer|Sami Hazinses|Hüseyin Peyda|Osman Betin|Mehmet Samsa|Yilmaz Kurt|Mehmet Ugur|Sümer Tilmaç|Andy Dallas|Peter A. Davis|Steve Glaser|Eric W. Sizemore|Jennifer Zahn|Alex Mitchell|Al Morrison|Meagan Rachelle|Joshua Stafford
title: Korkusuz
